objects.text:
16.3MP X-Trans CMOS II Sensor • Fast Autofocus with 77 AF Points
Tilting LCD Screen • Electronic Viewfinder • Film Simulation Modes
Wi-Fi Connectivity • Full HD Video • Ergonomic Controls

product_details.name: Fujifilm X-T10 Mirrorless Digital Camera | Professional Photography Made Accessible
product_details.description:
• Classic retro-styled compact mirrorless camera with premium build quality
• Advanced 16.3MP X-Trans CMOS II APS-C sensor for exceptional image quality
• Versatile 3-inch tilting LCD screen for creative shooting angles
• High-precision electronic viewfinder (EVF) with real-time preview
• Fast autofocus system with 77 AF points for precise subject tracking
• Built-in Wi-Fi connectivity for instant photo sharing and remote control
• Film Simulation modes that recreate classic Fujifilm photographic looks
• Compatible with Fujifilm's extensive X-mount lens system
• Ergonomic dial-based controls for intuitive manual operation
• Full HD 1080p video recording capabilities
• Compact and lightweight design perfect for travel photography
• Multiple customizable function buttons for personalized operation

banner_details:
This promotional banner features a bold, modern design centered around a high-resolution product image with strong symmetrical layout. The background is deep black with layered concentric graphic circles and a subtle grid for structural balance. The title (`heading`) in uppercase white sans-serif font stands out prominently at the top, followed by a secondary tagline (`tagline`) in a clean serif font with a vibrant accent color, conveying accessibility and quality. Below the product, the features (`description`) are listed in compact white text. The price (`price`) is emphasized in bold, large orange-red typography, complemented by a bright call-to-action button (`cta_button`) and the button label (`cta`) in white.

**Color Palette:**
- Dark Charcoal: `#1A1A1A`
- Light Charcoal Circles: `#232323`, `#2C2C2C`, `#353535`
- White: `#FFFFFF`
- Accent Orange-Red: `#E73C17`
- Medium Gray Grid Lines: `#444444`
product_color: The product image features a Fujifilm X-T10 camera, primarily dominated by a sleek matte black finish (#1A1A1A), giving it a professional and premium appearance. Shiny metallic elements, such as the lens rings and dials, blend shades of dark graphite (#2E2E2E) and silver-gray (#AFAFAF), adding contrast and depth. Subtle highlights from light reflections on the lens bring in hints of emerald green (#4FC08D) and soft yellow (#F2E58D), boosting visual interest. White text and logo elements (#FFFFFF) stand out sharply, ensuring brand recognition. Together, this elegant and cohesive color palette makes for a high-impact advertisement banner design that's clean and modern.
